expression: Context element's value equals a string constant: contextName, stringABCDE

predicate.name: weblogic.entitlement.rules.ContextElementStringEquals

arguments.descriptionHTML: Name of the Context Element which value is to be evaluated
The string value to compare against.

predicate.descriptionHTML: Creates a condition for a security policy that is true when the context element's value is equal to a string constant.
predicate.displayName: Context element's value equals a string constant
